panels.description: Connections which delivered metrics in the last 7 days

targets.expr: count by (ditto_connection_type) (count by (instance, ditto_connection_id, ditto_connection_type) (increase(connectivity_message_mapping_seconds_count{instance=~"$Host", ditto_connection_type=~"$ConnectionType", ditto_connection_id=~"$Connection"}[5m]) > 0))

panels.title: active connections over the last 5 minutes

panels.description: Connections which delivered metrics in the last 7 days

targets.expr: count by (instance, ditto_connection_type) (count by (instance, ditto_connection_id, ditto_connection_type) (increase (connectivity_message_mapping_seconds_count{instance=~"$Host", ditto_connection_type=~"$ConnectionType", ditto_connection_id=~"$Connection"}[5m]) > 0))

panels.title: active connections over the last 5 minutes per instance

targets.expr: sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="consumed", direction="inbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0

panels.description: This number reflects the number of messages that resulted out of payload mappings per second.

targets.expr: sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="mapped", direction="inbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0

panels.title: #mapped messages per second

targets.expr: sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="dropped", direction="inbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="acknowledged", direction="inbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
count(rate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="throttled", direction="inbound"}[5m])>0) by (type, id)
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="enforced", direction="inbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="dispatched", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, id) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="dispatched", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="filtered", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0

panels.description: This number reflects the number of messages that resulted out of payload mappings per second.

targets.expr: sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="mapped", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0

panels.title: #mapped messages per second

targets.expr: sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="dropped", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="published", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0
sum(irate(connection_messages_total{instance=~"$Host", id=~"$Connection", type=~"$ConnectionType", category="acknowledged", direction="outbound"}[5m])) by (type, success) > 0

avg((idelta(connectivity_message_mapping_seconds_sum{segment="overall", instance=~"$Host", ditto_connection_id=~"$Connection", ditto_connection_type=~"$ConnectionType"}[5m]) / idelta(connectivity_message_mapping_seconds_count{segment="overall", ditto_connection_id=~"$Connection", ditto_connection_type=~"$ConnectionType"}[5m])) > 0) by (ditto_mapping_success, direction, ditto_connection_type)
